18 float torso_goal_pose;

20 std::vector<float> arm_goal_pose;
21 std::vector<float> arm_complete_cp;
22 std::vector<float> gripper_goal_pose;
23 bool msg_arm_recived = true;
24 bool msg_torso_recived = false;
25 bool msg_gripper_recived = true;
26 bool msg_gripp_torq_recived = false;
27 bool msg_suction_recived = false;
28 bool wait_for_arm_goal_pose = false;
29 bool wait_for_torso_goal_pose = false;

31 tmc_control_msgs::GripperApplyEffortGoal goal;
32 tmc_suction::SuctionControlGoal goal_suction;
33 
34 
35 void armSuctionCallback(const std_msgs::Bool::ConstPtr& msg)
36 {
37  goal_suction.suction_on.data = msg->data;
38 
39  if (msg->data)
40  std::cout << "Takeshi Hardware-> SuctionGripper is [ACTIVE]" << std::endl;
41  else
42  std::cout << "Takeshi Hardware-> SuctionGripper is [INACTIVE]" << std::endl;
43 
44  msg_suction_recived = true;
45 }
46 
47 
48 
49 void armGoalPoseCallback(const std_msgs::Float32MultiArray::ConstPtr& msg)
50 {
51  if(msg->data.size() != 4)
52  {
53  std::cout << "[ARM-NODE]: Error data size." << std::endl;
54  std::cout << "[ARM-NODE]: Arm data must be four values." << std::endl;
55  }
56  else
57  msg_arm_recived = true;
58 
59  arm_goal_pose.resize(4);
60 
61  if(msg_arm_recived)
62  {
63  for(int i = 0; i < 4; i++)
64  arm_goal_pose[i] = msg->data[i];
65  }
66 }
67 
68 void gripperPoseCallback(const std_msgs::Float32::ConstPtr& msg)
69 {
70  // Expected value between [0.0 - 1.0] where 0.0 is close gripper and 1.0 is totally open gripper
71  gripper_goal_pose.resize(1);
72  gripper_goal_pose[0] = -0.105 + (msg->data)*( 1.23 + 0.105); // Joint limits from official page
73 
74  msg_gripper_recived = true;
75 }
76 
77 void gripperTorqueCallback(const std_msgs::Float32::ConstPtr& msg)
78 {
79  goal.effort = msg->data * (-1);
80  msg_gripp_torq_recived = true;
81 }
82 
83 
84 void torsoGoalPoseCallback(const std_msgs::Float32::ConstPtr& msg)
85 {
86  torso_goal_pose = msg->data;
87  msg_torso_recived = true;
88 }
89 
90 void armCurrentPoseCallback(const control_msgs::JointTrajectoryControllerState::ConstPtr& msg)
91 {
92  // Read five values of torso and arm
93  arm_complete_cp.resize(5);
94  arm_complete_cp[0] = msg->actual.positions[0]; // torso joint
95  arm_complete_cp[1] = msg->actual.positions[1];
96  arm_complete_cp[2] = msg->actual.positions[2];
97  arm_complete_cp[3] = msg->actual.positions[3];
98  arm_complete_cp[4] = msg->actual.positions[4];
99 }

101 
102 
103 int main(int argc, char **argv)
104 {
105  std::cout << std::endl << "------------------------->" << std::endl;
106  std::cout << "INITIALIZING ARM_BRIDGE_NODE BY [EDD-II] " << std::endl;
107  ros::init(argc, argv, "arm_bridge");
108 
109  std_msgs::Float32 msg_torso_current_pose;
110  std_msgs::Float32MultiArray msg_arm_current_pose;
111  std_msgs::Bool msg_arm_goal_pose;
112  std_msgs::Bool msg_torso_goal_pose;
113 
114  // initalize ROS publisher
115  ros::NodeHandle n;
116  ros::Publisher pub_hsr_arm_gp;
117  ros::Publisher pub_hsr_gripp_gp;
118  ros::Publisher pub_torso_curren_pose;
119  ros::Publisher pub_arm_curren_pose;
120  ros::Publisher pub_arm_goal_pose;
121  ros::Publisher pub_torso_goal_pose;
122 
123  ros::Subscriber sub_pumas_arm_gp;
124  ros::Subscriber sub_pumas_gripp_gp;
125  ros::Subscriber sub_pumas_torque_gripp;
126  ros::Subscriber sub_pumas_suction_gripp;
127  ros::Subscriber sub_torso_goal_pose;
128  ros::Subscriber sub_hsr_arm_cp;
129 
130 
131 
132  actionlib::SimpleActionClient<tmc_control_msgs::GripperApplyEffortAction>
133  gripperActionClient("/hsrb/gripper_controller/grasp", true);
134 
135  actionlib::SimpleActionClient<tmc_suction::SuctionControlAction>
136  suctionActionClient("/hsrb/suction_control");
137 
138  ros::Rate loop(60);
139 
140  // Publishers for hsr-hardware
141  pub_hsr_arm_gp = n.advertise<trajectory_msgs::JointTrajectory>("/hsrb/arm_trajectory_controller/command", 10);
142  pub_hsr_gripp_gp = n.advertise<trajectory_msgs::JointTrajectory>("/hsrb/gripper_controller/command", 10);
143  pub_torso_curren_pose = n.advertise<std_msgs::Float32>("/hardware/torso/current_pose", 10);
144  pub_arm_curren_pose = n.advertise<std_msgs::Float32MultiArray>("/hardware/arm/current_pose", 10);
145  pub_arm_goal_pose = n.advertise<std_msgs::Bool>("/hardware/arm/armGoalPose", 10);
146  pub_torso_goal_pose = n.advertise<std_msgs::Bool>("/hardware/torso/goal_reached", 10);
147 
148 
149  sub_pumas_arm_gp = n.subscribe("/hardware/arm/goal_pose", 10, armGoalPoseCallback);
150  sub_pumas_gripp_gp = n.subscribe("/hardware/arm/goal_gripper", 10, gripperPoseCallback);
151  sub_pumas_torque_gripp = n.subscribe("/hardware/arm/torque_gripper", 10, gripperTorqueCallback);
152  sub_pumas_suction_gripp = n.subscribe("/hardware/arm/gripper_suction", 10, armSuctionCallback);
153  sub_torso_goal_pose = n.subscribe("/hardware/torso/goal_pose", 10, torsoGoalPoseCallback);
154  sub_hsr_arm_cp = n.subscribe("/hsrb/arm_trajectory_controller/state", 10, armCurrentPoseCallback);
155 
156  // wait for the action server to start
157  gripperActionClient.waitForServer();
158  suctionActionClient.waitForServer();
159 
160 
161  // wait to establish connection between the controller
162  while (pub_hsr_arm_gp.getNumSubscribers() == 0) {
163  ros::Duration(0.1).sleep();
164  }
165 
166 
167  // make sure the controller is running
168  ros::ServiceClient client = n.serviceClient<controller_manager_msgs::ListControllers>(
169  "/hsrb/controller_manager/list_controllers");
170  controller_manager_msgs::ListControllers list_controllers;
171  bool running = false;
172  while (running == false) {
173  ros::Duration(0.1).sleep();
174  if (client.call(list_controllers)) {
175  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < list_controllers.response.controller.size(); i++) {
176  controller_manager_msgs::ControllerState c = list_controllers.response.controller[i];
177  if (c.name == "arm_trajectory_controller" && c.state == "running") {
178  running = true;
179  }
180  }
181  }
182  }
183 
184  // fill ROS message
185  trajectory_msgs::JointTrajectory traj_arm;
186  trajectory_msgs::JointTrajectory traj_gripp;
187 
188  traj_arm.joint_names.push_back("arm_lift_joint");
189  traj_arm.joint_names.push_back("arm_flex_joint");
190  traj_arm.joint_names.push_back("arm_roll_joint");
191  traj_arm.joint_names.push_back("wrist_flex_joint");
192  traj_arm.joint_names.push_back("wrist_roll_joint");
193  traj_gripp.joint_names.push_back("hand_motor_joint"); // Gripper trayectorie msgs
194 
195  traj_arm.points.resize(1);
196  traj_gripp.points.resize(1);
197 
198  traj_arm.points[0].positions.resize(5);
199  traj_arm.points[0].velocities.resize(5);
200  traj_gripp.points[0].positions.resize(1);
201  traj_gripp.points[0].velocities.resize(1);
202  traj_gripp.points[0].effort.resize(1);
203 
204  //msg_torso_current_pose.data.resize(1);
205  msg_arm_current_pose.data.resize(4);
206 
207 
208  // Initial values
209  traj_arm.points[0].velocities[0] = 0.0;
210  traj_arm.points[0].velocities[1] = 0.0;
211  traj_arm.points[0].velocities[2] = 0.1;
212  traj_arm.points[0].velocities[3] = 0.1;
213  traj_arm.points[0].velocities[4] = 0.1;
214  traj_gripp.points[0].velocities[0] = -0.5;
215 
216  traj_arm.points[0].positions[0] = 0.0;
217  traj_arm.points[0].positions[1] = 0.0;
218  traj_arm.points[0].positions[2] = -1.5707;
219  traj_arm.points[0].positions[3] = -1.5707;
220  traj_arm.points[0].positions[4] = 0.0;
221  traj_gripp.points[0].positions[0] = -0.4;
222 
223  traj_gripp.points[0].effort[0] = -0.2;
224 
225  traj_arm.points[0].time_from_start = ros::Duration(3.0);
226  traj_gripp.points[0].time_from_start = ros::Duration(3.0);
227 
228  arm_goal_pose.resize(5);
229  arm_complete_cp.resize(5);
230  gripper_goal_pose.resize(1);
231 
232 
233  arm_goal_pose[0] = 0.0;
234  arm_goal_pose[1] = -1.5707;
235  arm_goal_pose[2] = -1.5707;
236  arm_goal_pose[3] = 0.0;
237 
238 
239  while(ros::ok())
240  {
241  // Set goal_pose
242  for (size_t i = 0; i < 4; ++i)
243  traj_arm.points[0].positions[i+1] = arm_goal_pose[i];
244 
245  traj_gripp.points[0].positions[0] = gripper_goal_pose[0];
246  traj_arm.points[0].positions[0] = torso_goal_pose;
247 
248  // Set current pose for publish
249  msg_torso_current_pose.data = arm_complete_cp[0];
250  msg_arm_current_pose.data[0] = arm_complete_cp[1];
251  msg_arm_current_pose.data[1] = arm_complete_cp[2];
252  msg_arm_current_pose.data[2] = arm_complete_cp[3];
253  msg_arm_current_pose.data[3] = arm_complete_cp[4];
254 
255 
256  // publish ROS message
257  if(msg_arm_recived)
258  {
259  pub_hsr_arm_gp.publish(traj_arm);
260  msg_arm_recived = false;
261  wait_for_arm_goal_pose = true;
262  }
263 
264  if(msg_torso_recived)
265  {
266  pub_hsr_arm_gp.publish(traj_arm);
267  msg_torso_recived = false;
268  wait_for_torso_goal_pose = true;
269  }
270 
271  if(msg_gripper_recived)
272  {
273  pub_hsr_gripp_gp.publish(traj_gripp);
274  msg_gripper_recived = false;
275  }
276 
277  if(msg_gripp_torq_recived)
278  {
279  gripperActionClient.sendGoalAndWait(goal);
280  msg_gripp_torq_recived = false;
281  }
282 
283  if(msg_suction_recived)
284  {
285  suctionActionClient.sendGoalAndWait(goal_suction);
286  msg_suction_recived = false;
287  }
288 
289  if(pub_torso_curren_pose.getNumSubscribers() > 0)
290  pub_torso_curren_pose.publish(msg_torso_current_pose);
291 
292  if(pub_arm_curren_pose.getNumSubscribers() > 0)
293  pub_arm_curren_pose.publish(msg_arm_current_pose);
294 
295 
296  if(wait_for_arm_goal_pose){
297  float arm_d=0;
298  for(size_t i=0; i < msg_arm_current_pose.data.size(); i++)
299  arm_d=arm_d+pow(traj_arm.points[0].positions[i+1] - msg_arm_current_pose.data[i],2);
300  arm_d=pow(arm_d,0.5);
301  if(arm_d < 0.01){
302  std::cout << "Wait for arm goal pose: true" << std::endl;
303  msg_arm_goal_pose.data=true;
304  pub_arm_goal_pose.publish(msg_arm_goal_pose);
305  wait_for_arm_goal_pose = false;
306  }
307  }
308 
309  if(wait_for_torso_goal_pose){
310  float torso_d=0;
311  torso_d=fabs(traj_arm.points[0].positions[0] - msg_torso_current_pose.data);
312  if(torso_d < 0.01){
313  std::cout << "Wait for torso goal pose: true " << torso_d << std::endl;
314  msg_torso_goal_pose.data=true;
315  pub_torso_goal_pose.publish(msg_torso_goal_pose);
316  wait_for_torso_goal_pose = false;
317  }
318  }
319 
320  loop.sleep();
321  ros::spinOnce();
322  }
323  return 0;
324 }
